needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text:
The secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza are typically listed as:

* High-quality cheese
* Fresh, high-quality toppings such as prosciutto or goat cheese

These ingredients are mentioned in Aristotle's Metaphysics as the most general principles, implying that they are fundamental to the ultimate goal of philosophy.
